velinov.java.vrep.objects

Interface ObjectUpdater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventDispatchable, java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsObjectUpdater, RealFinkenDroneUpdater, VirtualFinkenDroneUpdater

    public interface ObjectUpdater
extends EventDispatchable, java.lang.Runnable
    Defines an VrepObject updater, that updates the objects with their dynamic simulation parameters.
    Since:
    04.05.2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NAME
      defines the name of the thread.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_OBJECTS_UPDATED
      a property key that is fired when the ObjectUpdater updates the VrepObjects.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_STARTED
      a property key that is fired when the ObjectUpdater gets started.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRunning() 
      void start()
      start the updater.
      void stop()
      stop the scanner.

      • Methods inherited from interface velinov.java.event.EventDispatchable

        addPropertyChangeListener, addPropertyChangeListener, addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Field Detail

      • NAME

        static final java.lang.String NAME
        defines the name of the thread.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_STARTED

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_STARTED
        a property key that is fired when the ObjectUpdater gets started.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_OBJECTS_UPDATED

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_OBJECTS_UPDATED
        a property key that is fired when the ObjectUpdater updates the VrepObjects. The frequency at which the objects get updated depends on the simulation step.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        start the updater.

      • stop

        void stop()
        stop the scanner.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the updater is currently updating.
